channel.title: How to make a. jar?
channel.description:
IM SORRY IF THIS IS IN WRONG SECTION, I HAVNT BEEN ON MOPARSCAPE FOR AGES. Due to call of duty mw2 and black ops
Ok now i have the jar maker program but i tried doing it the output and input and the manifest ive done but when i click it it cant find the class or something
Does any1 have pics of tutorial links and explains each picture!

[/quote]Making it a jar wont solve the problem.[/quote]

well he has rann .jar files in the past and he still does succussfully

dont worry, i think java is is installed the wrong placed in his pc

i will do remote assistance with him

Thanks david!

Btw nice 508 source you made

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Because those aren’t executable jars, they are just normal jars that can easily be hosted on the web etc.

Are you trying to make executable jars?

item.title: How to make a. jar?
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

it worked and it made

ClientPRE.jar
Client.jar
comsptore.file

butt wheni click on the ClientPRE.jar and Client.jar
it says
“Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from
C:\Documents and settings\mypcuserhere\desktop\myclientname\myclientnameagain\clientfiles\ClientPRE.jar” or client.jar depending what i opened

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a. jar?
item.dc:creator: @Penetration Penetration
item.description:
@Penetration wrote:

Try what Davidi2 said, if it doesn’t work for you, scroll to the .jar’ing section of this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html
Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a. jar?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

@echo off title Jar "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_18/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_18/bin/jar.exe" cvf ClientPRE.jar *.class "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_18/bin/keytool.exe" -genkey -alias signFiles -keystore compstore -keypass 123456 -dname "cn=YOURLASTNAME" -storepass 123456 "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_18/bin/jarsigner.exe" -keystore compstore -storepass 123456 -keypass 123456 -signedjar Client.jar ClientPRE.jar signFiles pause

Make a new batch file with this code, and put it in your main client folder (with the class files). Change the JDK version to yours ofc, and then run it. Client.jar will be a signed jar.

Read full topic
